artefact.overview: Apply for a Blue Badge, amend or cancel a saved application, track your application
artefact.more_information:
##After you apply
[Amend or cancel your saved Blue Badge application.](https://bluebadge.direct.gov.uk/directgovreturn.html "Amend or cancel your saved Blue Badge application"){:rel="external"}

[Track your Blue Badge application.](https://bluebadge.direct.gov.uk/directgovtrack.html "Track your Blue Badge application"){:rel="external"}

##Northern Ireland
[Apply for a Blue Badge in Northern Ireland.](http://www.nidirect.gov.uk/index/people-with-disabilities/motoring-and-transport-1/blue-badge-scheme/the-blue-badge-parking-scheme.htm "Apply for a Blue Badge in Northern Ireland"){:rel="external"}

##Questions
For questions about the Blue Badge scheme, contact [your local council](/blue-badge-scheme-information-council "Blue Badge scheme: information from your council") or the Initial Enquiry Support Service.

$C
**Blue Badge Initial Enquiry Support Service**

**Email:** <bluebadge@northgate-is.com>  
**Telephone:** 0844 463 0213 (England), 0844 463 0214 (Scotland), 0844 463 0215 (Wales)  
$C
artefact.introduction: You'll answer questions about your disability to check your eligibility for a Blue Badge. If your answers show you're likely to qualify, you can fill in an application form. Your application is sent to your council for a decision.
